parameters.definition: Amount of raw material i available
Amount of raw material i required to produce one unit of product j
Price at which product j can be sold
Cost of producing one unit of product j

description: Wild Sports produces different products using different raw materials. The company has a specific amount of each raw material available. Each product requires some amount of each raw material to be produced. Each product has a selling price per unit and a production cost. Each product also has a forecasted maximum demand for the month. How many of each product should the sports produce to maximize its profit for the month?
